",["$r","p",null,{"children":["除此之外，",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<option>"}]," 还支持以下属性："]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTML/Element/option#disabled","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"disabled"}]}],"：布尔值。如果 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"disabled"}]," 为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"true"}],"，该选项（option）将会被选中，并将展示为暗淡状态（dimmed）。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTML/Element/option#label","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"label"}]}],"：字符串。指定选项的含义。如果未指定，则使用选项内部的文本。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTML/Element/option#value","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"value"}]}],"：如果选择了此选项，则在提交表单时将使用此选项的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"value"}]," 值作为父级 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<select>"}]," 的值。详细信息请参阅 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/components/select#reading-the-select-box-value-when-submitting-a-form","children":["在提交表单时读取 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<select>"}]," 值"]}],"。"]}],"
"]}],"

",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["React 不支持在 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<option>"}]," 上使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"selected"}]," 属性。相反，对于非受控选择框，请将此选项的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"value"}]," 属性传递给父级 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/components/select#providing-an-initially-selected-option","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"<select defaultValue>"}]}],"；对于受控选择框，请使用 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/components/select#controlling-a-select-box-with-a-state-variable","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"<select value>"}]}]," 来控制选择框的值。"]}],"

"]}],["$r","Sandpack",null,{"children":[["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-js","children":"export default function FruitPicker() {
  return (
    <label>
      选择一个水果：
      <select name="精选水果">
        <option value="苹果">苹果</option>
        <option value="香蕉">香蕉</option>
        <option value="橘子">橘子</option>
      </select>
    </label>
  );
}
